description: Update an existing external identification type
permissions: Requires an admin user; policy update? requires is_user_admin?.
side_effects: Updates fields on an existing external identification type record.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. At least one field must be provided for update. If provided, --name must be unique. If provided, --can-apply-to must include at least one entity type; each entry must be one of: Broker, BrokerInvoice, Customer, CustomerCommitment, CustomerTender, Developer, Equipment, Job, JobProductionPlan, JobProductionPlanMaterialType, JobSite, Laborer, MaterialPurchaseOrder, MaterialPurchaseOrderRelease, MaterialSite, MaterialSupplier, MaterialType, Project, ProjectCostClassification, ProjectRevenueClassification, ProjectRevenueItem, ProjectTransportLocation, ProjectTransportOrganization, ProjectTransportPlanEvent, ProjectTransportPlanSegment, ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSet, TradingPartner, TransportOrder, TransportOrderStop, Trucker, TruckerInvoice. If provided, --format-validation-regex must be a valid regex. value_should_be_globally_unique must be true or false.

flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.description: New entity types this can apply to
flags.validation: If provided, must include at least one entity type. Allowed values: Broker, BrokerInvoice, Customer, CustomerCommitment, CustomerTender, Developer, Equipment, Job, JobProductionPlan, JobProductionPlanMaterialType, JobSite, Laborer, MaterialPurchaseOrder, MaterialPurchaseOrderRelease, MaterialSite, MaterialSupplier, MaterialType, Project, ProjectCostClassification, ProjectRevenueClassification, ProjectRevenueItem, ProjectTransportLocation, ProjectTransportOrganization, ProjectTransportPlanEvent, ProjectTransportPlanSegment, ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSet, TradingPartner, TransportOrder, TransportOrderStop, Trucker, TruckerInvoice.

flags.name: --format-validation-regex
flags.validation: Must be a valid regex if provided.
